title: The Flinders: ranges of legend
creator_credit: G Shepherd and S A Government Tourist Bureau
brief_description: The geological origin and the place of the Flinders Range in Aboriginal mythology. Shows rock paintings and carvings in the Wilpena area, the old mining town of Blinman and the ruins of Kanyaka.
creator_credit_for_label: G Shepherd and S A Government Tourist Bureau
description: The geological origin and the place of the Flinders Range in Aboriginal mythology. Shows rock paintings and carvings in the Wilpena area, the old mining town of Blinman and the ruins of Kanyaka.
